short_summary: Ministere de la Defense nationale desires se procurer les articles suivants
full_summary:
# Multiple Victoria Class Spares Solicitation

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Title: Multiple Victoria Class Spares – Gasket, Actuator, Hydraulic-Pneumatic, Linear, Pump, Rotary, Stud, Plain
* Solicitation Number: W8482-231034/A
* Publication Date: July 21, 2023
* Closing Date: August 30, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 27, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: May 1, 2024

## Description of Items

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of various components for the Victoria Class ships. The components are listed below:

| Item No. | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 001 | Gasket | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 002 | Gasket | 12 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 003 | Actuator (Hydraulic-Pneumatic, Linear) | 1 | AY | CFB Esquimalt |
| 004 | Actuator (Hydraulic-Pneumatic, Linear) | 1 | AY | CFB Halifax |
| 005 | Actuator (Hydraulic-Pneumatic, Linear) | 1 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 006 | Actuator (Hydraulic-Pneumatic, Linear) | 1 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 007 | Ram Servo Unit (Fore) | 1 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 008 | Ram Servo Unit (Fore) | 1 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 009 | Ram Servo Unit (Aft) | 1 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 010 | Ram Servo Unit (Aft) | 1 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 011 | Pump (Rotary) | 1 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 012 | Pump (Rotary) | 1 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 013 | Stud (Plain) | 100 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 014 | Stud (Plain) | 30 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 015 | Cap (Pressure Coupling) | 7 | EA | CFB Esquimal
